Line1.146C80: Very good, these will do. You’ll need the essence of life, a spirit, to transform your Golem.
Line3.146C80: There is a vile artifact buried in a hillside not far from here. Its purpose is to trap lost souls, leeching magic from them. Free those souls and perhaps they’ll help you in return.
VoiceDir3.146C80: annoyed at the artifact, but encouraging to the player
